name: Super Vikings Run
description:
Super Viking's is a great game adventure.

This Viking is now away from his village. To reach its pretty village he must cross a long road with a lot of obstacles and at the same time it collects the diamonds to buy a boat for him and the people of his trip.

The viking needs to Keep running, Jumping and needs to cross different obstacles, overcome dangers while collecting diamonds as you can to score the highest.

Each level has many obstacles,The Vikings are very impressive, they never give up!

Features:

- Cool and simple gameplay
- Amazing viking world
- Play for all ages
- Great Sounds and Graphics.
- Suitable for kids and children
- Easy to play

When Viking starts to run and jump into the land to collect the diamonds, there are many obstacles and dangers on his way. Then you come in charge. You must help Viking whenever there is an obstacle in the path, tap on the screen to make the Viking jump over the obstacles. There are many obstacles and dangers that you must avoid by tapping on the screen. When the Viking starts to run, it jumps higher than normal to reach the top floor. It feels like stealing and continues to collect more diamonds to increase the score and to pass all levels To reach its pretty village.
Do not forget to comment and rate 5* for this application, so that we can develop better.

Thanks a lot for playing!
